reviews.review:
Für mich der beste Ego-Shooter der Neunziger!
Das geniale Level- und Gegnerdesign bleiben einem lange im Kopf und man möchte es immer wieder spielen.
Half Life überzeugt durch viele Variationen an Waffen, eine stabile Mechanik und eine tiefgreifende Geschichte, die viel Platz zur eigenen Interpretation lässt.
All das wird untermalt durch richtig stimmige Musikstücke und Sound-Effekte. So muss das sein!
Ich liebe dieses Spiel und lege es jedem wärmstens ans Herz, wer es bisher noch nicht gespielt hat und jedem der es schon einmal gespielt hat, es nochmal zu spielen :D
valve的开山之作，十分经典，挺好玩的

Really not much to say on this game. It's a classic, and if you don't own it you should.

Gordon is an enjoyable character, and while he doesn't speak, you still grow a connection to him. This is expanded on in Half-Life 2. I also enjoyed the other characters that appear throughout the game, including the scientists, G-Man, etc.

The gameplay is fun, I thoroughly enjoyed the shooting and the game seriously posed a challenge at times. All the guns sound meaty and pack a real punch behind them. The platforming was a little frustrating at times, but never outright bad.

The only problem I really had with the game is that it doesn't hold your hand at all. Which can be good, but at the same time, it left me wandering around for good chunks of time with no clue on what to do. This resulted on me looking up guides a handful of times. Also, the final boss took me a minute to figure out.

I came to this game late, playing it for the first time ever last year. I really enjoyed it! 

In my opinion, this was better than Half Life 2 and all the other titles. It has elements of horror, which I love, and it doesn't become 'cutesie' like the later games in the series. 

Definitely recommend!

Comment dire, Half-Life c'est le FPS à faire obligatoirement après DOOM. Bien que je n'ai pas connu cette merveilleuse époque qui est 1998, mais je comprends totalement son impact dans le monde du jeu vidéo (les script). Ce jeu est toujours aussi bon aujourd'hui avec ses ''cinématique'' en temp réel (bcp plus immersif, pas besoin de lâcher sa souris, son ambiance et toujours aussi prenant, nan sans dec' les couloirs sombre où un tête de crabe te saute dessus me met pas super bien), le feeling des armes au top et un level design au ptit oignons bien que je peut remettre ça en cause dans les derniers chapitre. D'ailleurs les dernier chapitres que je ne veux pas divulguer si vous voulez faire le jeu, son littéralement une torture, j'ai tout sauf pris du plaisir, ma délivrance fut la mort du boss final (qui est chiant aussi mais ingénieux, suffis pas de lui tirer toute ses munition de BFG comme dans DOOM). Franchement Half-Life, c'est un incontournable, si vous aimez les FPS, par pitié faites le rien que pour ce qu'il à apporté dans le jeux vidéo, il est important, il claque quand on prend le recul des années, et en plus avec les soldes Steam, le jeu est presque gratuit. DONC GO !

This is a great game. My computer has so much stuff and games on it that it will lag almost all of the time. But this game has low graphics, so I don't need to worry about lag. The only problem is that the game says I am playing it when I am playing something else. I tried manual stopping, but it didn't work. I tried restarting steam, but it said that Half-Life needed to be stopped in order to sign out. I didn't want to restart my computer, so that option was was thrown into orbit via satellite rocket (pun from the rocket. Please laugh) I would like for the developer(s) to try to fix this problem. I don't know if it has happened to other players or just me, but please fix it for it is annoying. But thanks for the awesome game! :D Edit: I finally managed to stop the game, re-install it, and beat the final boss. This was a not awesome game, but a legendary game. There is no other game that could beat this game in my opinion. Best game ever.
Kinda janky at times, but still an AMAZING game and experience. would recommend!

İlk kez 2021 yılında bu oyunu hakkında hiçbir şey bilmeden oynamış biri olarak bayıldım. Yayınlanışının üzerinden yıllar geçmiş olmasına rağmen oynanıştan aldığım zevk bana asla eski hissettirmedi. Asla unutulmayacak, asla eskimeyecek, hangi yılda olursak olalım "kaliteli" sıfatını koruyacak bir oyun. Tebrikler ve teşekkürler Valve.
